data.title: bd-wj0j: Fix dev-loop cleanup - release worker claims after merge
data.description:
Fixes orphaned claims issue found during multi-lead session.

Changes:
1. Add claim release step (d2) after merging worker workspaces
2. Release both bead:// and workspace:// claims for dispatched workers
3. Add orphan cleanup step (2.5) at iteration start to detect stale claims
4. Detect closed/blocked beads with active claims and release them
5. Detect workspace claims for non-existent workspaces and release them

Test status: 2 pre-existing test failures in responder.rs (unrelated to this change). Only modified dev_loop/prompt.rs.

data.reason: Security review: No vulnerabilities found. Changes are prompt template instructions for claim cleanup - no executable code, no injection vectors, proper scoping to agent's own claims. TOCTOU window in orphan cleanup is acceptable for advisory locks.

Security review: No vulnerabilities. Prompt template changes only — no executable code, no injection vectors. Agent identity properly scoped via {agent} placeholder. Orphan cleanup correctly limited to agent's own claims.

Security review: No vulnerabilities. Prompt template changes only — no executable code, no injection vectors. Agent identity properly scoped via {agent} placeholder. Orphan cleanup correctly validates bead status before releasing claims. Claim URI construction follows existing safe patterns.
